backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining data models, maps, and access-controlled queries for benches, documents, components, history, and user profiles.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the frontend and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application root configuring routes, providers, theming, and i18n.
Route guard showing loading or access-denied states based on admin permissions.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI and allows page reload on errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Checks backend actor initialization and shows errors or loading UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard gating content based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Generic draggable list component enabling item reordering with drag-and-drop.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: Hook managing draggable list state including item order, drag start, drag over, and reset.
Defines the main application shell with navigation, theme toggle, and logout handling using Internet Identity and TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows scroll-to-top and scroll-to-bottom buttons based on scroll position and provides smooth scrolling actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Provides an input with suggestions for selecting or entering a single entity tag, including add/remove logic and validation display.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Renders a grid of selectable predefined avatars and highlights the currently chosen one.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Displays a user avatar using either a predefined or custom image, with cache-busting support and size variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
Zustand store that tracks a timestamp used to force reload of cached avatar images.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Manages a persisted dashboard chart type preference using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions using Internet Identity, managing login, stored identities, and error states.
Periodically calls backend to update the user's last-seen timestamp when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating test benches, user profiles, roles, and settings through the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides an i18n context managing the current language, loading state, and syncing language preferences with backend and localStorage.
frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts: Defines supported languages with metadata and helpers to check or fetch languages by code.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Declares all translation keys used across the UI for localization.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exposes a hook for accessing translations and language state using the I18n context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the main admin page with tabbed navigation for benches, documents, and users.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Displays all test benches with delete actions and confirmation dialogs for admin management.
Fetches and displays all documents in a list with metadata and provides download handling with loading and error states.
Loads and displays the current user’s profile with expiration settings and dashboard layout, handling loading and missing-profile states.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Shows detailed information for a specific test bench, including components, documents, history, editing, and removal actions.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Lists all test benches with search filtering, thumbnails, and a modal to create new benches.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Provides a complex modal form for creating a test bench, including photo upload, metadata, tags, documents, components, validation, and optional component duplication.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Editable table for adding, editing, removing, and duplicating bench components with expiration status handling.
Manages bench documents, including uploading, versioning, associating, deleting, and displaying categorized documents.
Displays sorted bench history entries with user info, timestamps, and optional details.
Renders a bench photo with loading and error fallbacks using an external blob URL.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Allows selecting document categories and uploading files with versions for each category.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Dialog to duplicate a component to selected benches with selection management and async mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Modal form for editing a test bench, handling field state, validation, photo upload, and submitting updates.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Tag input component allowing adding, removing, and selecting suggested tags with filtering.
Placeholder page describing upcoming features for creating a new test bench.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Pie chart card showing counts of components by expiration status using threshold rules.
Bar chart card displaying per‑bench counts of components grouped by expiration status.
Bar chart grouping components into expiration‑date ranges and showing counts per range.
Pie chart summarizing documents by category with fallback for unknown categories.
Bar or line chart showing component expiration trends aggregated by month.
Builds a bar or line chart showing expired component counts per bench using expiration thresholds and i18n.
Computes component health percentages and displays them as progress bars for ok, expiring soon, and expired.
Defines draggable statistic and chart cards for the dashboard and initializes their order and content.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page fetching data, computing component statuses, rendering sections, and supporting reordering and chart types.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page handling user info, expiration preferences, avatar selection, validation, and saving changes.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Sign‑in page using Internet Identity with UI feedback for login state and errors.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Provides a map of predefined avatar IDs to asset paths and helpers to retrieve avatar paths.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a file as an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Loads and returns the default bench photo as an ExternalBlob, with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Implements a helper to fetch bytes from an ExternalBlob and trigger a browser file download.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Converts unknown error values into readable messages with fallbacks for various error shapes.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration-threshold settings with localStorage fallback and computes expiration status for dates.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates a simple timestamp‑based unique ID string.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Rewrites bench descriptions by normalizing whitespace, capitalization, punctuation, and common abbreviations.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Provides text search across benches using multi-term case‑insensitive matching.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter extraction, session persistence, and hash‑based parameter cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates emails, domains, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and URLs with simple rule checks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and design tokens.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-side files enabling ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config using React, env injection, path aliases, API proxying, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Represents project state and pending feature requests focused on Test Bench translation and default language behavior.
